# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/ltx`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for ltx (github.com/node-xmpp/ltx/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/ltx
